EmailTemplate.description: When the reseller asks us about a customer's existing license status
EmailTemplate.name: [ENG] Reseller - Response to request for customers license status
EmailTemplate.subject: Epic Games Partner Order {{{Partner_Request__c.Name}}} update for {{{Partner_Request__c.Partner_Name__c}}}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello.
Please contact Epic's Channel team at Twinmotion-resellers@epicgames.com < Twinmotion-resellers@epicgames.com > for assistance with checking a customer's Twinmotion license status.
This Developer-Accessteam is not able to assist with this action.
Thank you
